Package com.charliai.activities.api

Class ActivityRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.charliai.activities.api.ActivityRequest
  • public class ActivityRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    The ActivityRequest class is responsible for handling message requests to activity handlers as well as responses back to the workflow engine (or calling activity handlers). This class assumes that inbound messages and outbound responses are going to be similar and should contain similar information.
